mapper.insert: insert into estimate_result (result_id, main_id, enterprise_cis, server_code, create_date, score_array, text_array, totle_score, mean_score, source_data) values (#{resultId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterpriseCis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{scoreArray,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textArray,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totleScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{meanScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sourceData,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update estimate_result set main_id = #{mainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enterprise_cis = #{enterpriseCis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, server_code = #{serverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, score_array = #{scoreArray,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, text_array = #{textArray,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, totle_score = #{totleScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, mean_score = #{meanScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, source_data = #{sourceData,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where result_id = #{resultId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select result_id, main_id, enterprise_cis, server_code, create_date, score_array, text_array, totle_score, mean_score, source_data from estimate_result where result_id = #{resultId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select result_id, main_id, enterprise_cis, server_code, create_date, score_array, text_array, totle_score, mean_score, source_data from estimate_result
